Part III
Administrative Measures Adopted by the Government and the Monetary Board during the Year

9. 
In the event an emigrant sells an immovable property which was inherited or purchased by such emigrant utilising Sri Lanka
Rupees held in Sri Lanka by such emigrant, to any person resident in or outside Sri Lanka, the payment of consideration with
respect to sale of such property shall be paid in Sri Lanka Rupees and credited only to a Non Resident Rupee Account or a
Capital Transaction Rupee Account of the emigrant.
